Subject: File upload not Blocked & Report is not generated, EPP agent file for MacOS15 || PRAELLA GUJARAT ||
Description: Hi Team, We are facing the below issues on the EPP POC. Also need a clarification on above listed queries: Issues: 1. File upload is not blocked on the Web mails. but file upload is getting blocked on dlptest.com URL. 2. Initially CAP reports are generated but shadow copy is not coming. Almost waited for 15mins but shadowcopy is not coming with the reports. 3. After sometimes general CAP reports also not generated. Queries: 1. Customer has MacOS 15 version, But in our console able to see the latest macos version 14 only to download the agent. Please provide the agent file for MacOS15 or confirm can use same setup file for MacOS15 as well. 2. Customer using Gsuite webmail access. They wants to allow send the email to listed email domains only. If incase user is trying to send the email to gmail.com id or non listed domains, the mail sending should get block. Please take this case on critical priority and resolve the reported issues and queries asap. Regards, Prasanth
Solution_Comment__c:
Had a session with the customer as seen below:
Issues resolved:
1. File upload was blocked accordingly on the Gmail web interface.
2. After enableling the File Hash option in Global settings, the shadow files came up and could be downloaded.
3. The issue did not occur.

Queries were answered in the meantime and the customer mentioned that these are ok.

Ticket will be closed.
